attributes.additional_details: my dad is a british citizen who has wrongly been accused for a crime he has not committed in a foreign country where there is no real justice system in place. he has been held in prison with no proof for over 10 days.no proper food.no personal hygiene facilities.he is innocent.the conditions are dreadful.please sign to help free my dad!my dad isnt even allowed a shower.some family have flew out to see him and they have to pay to visit my dad in prison.we need help to 1 help him be treated better 2 free him.he is in a country that get by on bribeey.
